Warning: This is a German CTF so Stuff in English might not make Sense from Time to Time, I will try to explain it.
===================================================================================================================


CTF: Montys Tresor

Description: Take a good look around

Hint: Check for Check.php

==================================================================================================================

This CTF is a kinda Funny one. You start on a Website with a Catpicture and some text. The First thing you might notice is that some parts of the Text is Highlited.

-> eXORbitant
-> 07 Leben

Those are important Hints (even if they dont look like some)

First of all we are going to take a look at the Picture and use a Command like:

unix 			strings kleinerheler.jpg > result.txt
Windows 		more < kleinerhelfer.jpg | findstr "." > result.txt

This will create a "Result.txt", open it to find the Hidden String on the Picture 

There we get a Bunch of Numbers


""

You have to go to a Website like Cyberchef.

Put the Numbers in there and let the "Magic Wand" do the Rest:

You should see something like: 


00000000  4b 6e 37 73 4b 54 46 72 4b 54 33 72 4e 44 37 73  |Kn7sKTFrKT3rND7s|
00000010  4b 6e 46 72 4b 6e 33 73 4b 54 46 72 4b 6e 46 72  |KnFrKn3sKTFrKnFr|
00000020  4b 54 37 60 4b 6e 33 60 4b 6e 33 72 4b 54 37 60  |KT7`Kn3`Kn3rKT7`|
00000030  4b 54 46 73 4b 6e 37 73 4e 44 37 72 4b 6e 33 60  |KTFsKn7sND7rKn3`|
00000040  4b 6e 33 72 4b 6e 37 60 4b 54 33 73 4e 44 37 73  |Kn3rKn7`KT3sND7s|
00000050  4b 6e 37 3a                                      |Kn7:|

What you need here is:

Kn7sKTFrKT3rND7sKnFrKn3sKTFrKnFrKT7`Kn3`Kn3rKT7`KTFsKn7sND7rKn3`Kn3rKn7`KT3sND7sKn7:

You remember the Part with 07 and "eXORbitant"? Its a Hint to XOR Encryption with the key 07. 

Use XOR with Key 07 in Cyberchef to get:

Li0tLSAuLS4uIC0tLiAuLi4tLSAuLiAuLS0gLi4gLi4uLS0gLSAtLi0tIC0uLi4gLi4uLi0gLS4tIC0tLi0=

Again the Magic Wand will Help you:

it will Tell you that the String is in Base64 and create some Morse Code

Again on the Magic Wand and you get the (almost) final String:

JLG3IWI3TYB4KQ

Now it gets a bit (I dont know how to call this to be honest)

You need Red9

I used this Website to decrypt it:

https://www.thomas-kuehn.de/geocaching/rot.php

And the end of the Line is:

SUP3RFR3CHK4TZ

(This is Leetspeach for "Super Naughty Cat")

Now we Go to see the "check.php" but only to find out that the password does not fit?

Well in the properties of the input file there are some restrictions on what the password file will accept. In this case only lowercase passwords.


After this you are finished
